alert.note: Alert for Clark; Crawford; Floyd; Harrison; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued June 25 at 10:24PM EDT until June 25 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 379 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM EDT /10 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL INDIANA CLARK IN CRAWFORD FLOYD HARRISON IN PERRY IN KENTUCKY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 37 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL KENTUCKY ANDERSON BOURBON BOYLE CLARK KY FAYETTE FRANKLIN GARRARD HARRISON KY JESSAMINE MADISON MERCER NICHOLAS SCOTT KY WOODFORD IN NORTH CENTRAL KENTUCKY BRECKINRIDGE BULLITT HARDIN HENRY JEFFERSON KY LARUE MEADE NELSON OLDHAM SHELBY SPENCER WASHINGTON KY IN NORTHWEST KENTUCKY HANCOCK OHIO IN SOUTH CENTRAL KENTUCKY CASEY GRAYSON GREEN HART LINCOLN MARION TAYLOR IN SOUTH CENTRAL KENTUCKY BUTLER EDMONSON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BARDSTOWN, BRANDENBURG, BROWNSVILLE, CAMPBELLSVILLE, CARLISLE, CORYDON, CYNTHIANA, DANVILLE, ELIZABETHTOWN, ENGLISH, FRANKFORT, GEORGETOWN, GREENSBURG, HARDINSBURG, HARRODSBURG, HARTFORD, HAWESVILLE, HODGENVILLE, JEFFERSONVILLE, LA GRANGE, LANCASTER, LAWRENCEBURG, LEBANON, LEITCHFIELD, LEWISPORT, LEXINGTON, LIBERTY, LOUISVILLE, MORGANTOWN, MUNFORDVILLE, NEW ALBANY, NEW CASTLE, NICHOLASVILLE, PARIS, RICHMOND, SHELBYVILLE, SHEPHERDSVILLE, SPRINGFIELD, STANFORD, TAYLORSVILLE, TELL CITY, VERSAILLES, AND WINCHESTER.
